014package org.jdbi.v3.jpa.internal;
015
016import java.beans.IndexedPropertyDescriptor;
017import java.beans.IntrospectionException;
018import java.beans.Introspector;
019import java.lang.reflect.Field;
020import java.lang.reflect.Method;
021import java.util.ArrayList;
022import java.util.Collection;
023import java.util.HashMap;
024import java.util.List;
025import java.util.Locale;
026import java.util.Map;
027import java.util.Objects;
028import java.util.WeakHashMap;
029import java.util.stream.Stream;
030
031import javax.persistence.Column;
032import javax.persistence.MappedSuperclass;
033
034import org.slf4j.Logger;
035import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
036
037import static java.util.Collections.synchronizedMap;
038import static java.util.Collections.unmodifiableList;
039
040public class JpaClass<C> {
041    private static final Logger LOGGER = LoggerFactory.getLogger(JpaClass.class);
042    private static final Map<Class<?>, JpaClass<?>> CACHE = synchronizedMap(new WeakHashMap<>());
043
044    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
045    public static <C> JpaClass<C> get(Class<C> clazz) {
046        return (JpaClass<C>) CACHE.computeIfAbsent(clazz, JpaClass::new);
047    }
048
049    private final List<JpaMember> members;
050
051    private JpaClass(Class<C> clazz) {
052        this.members = unmodifiableList(new ArrayList<>(inspectClass(clazz)));
053
054        LOGGER.debug("init {}: {} members.", clazz, members.size());
055    }
056
057    private static Collection<JpaMember> inspectClass(Class<?> clazz) {
058        Map<String, JpaMember> members = new HashMap<>();
059
060        inspectFields(clazz, members);
061        inspectAnnotatedProperties(clazz, members);
062        inspectSuperclasses(clazz, members);
063        inspectNonAnnotatedProperties(clazz, members);
064
065        return members.values();
066    }
067
068    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AssignmentInOperand")
069    private static void inspectSuperclasses(Class<?> clazz,
070                                            Map<String, JpaMember> members) {
071        Class<?> c = clazz;
072        while ((c = c.getSuperclass()) != null) {
073            if (c.isAnnotationPresent(MappedSuperclass.class)) {
074                inspectFields(c, members);
075            }
076        }
077    }
078
079    private static void inspectFields(Class<?> clazz,
080                                      Map<String, JpaMember> members) {
081        for (Field member : clazz.getDeclaredFields()) {
082            if (members.containsKey(member.getName())) {
083                continue;
084            }
085
086            Column column = member.getAnnotation(Column.class);
087            if (column != null) {
088                members.put(member.getName(), new JpaMember(clazz, column, member));
089            }
090        }
091    }
092
093    private static void inspectAnnotatedProperties(Class<?> clazz,
094                                                   Map<String, JpaMember> members) {
095        inspectProperties(clazz, members, true);
096    }
097
098    private static void inspectNonAnnotatedProperties(Class<?> clazz,
099                                                   Map<String, JpaMember> members) {
100        inspectProperties(clazz, members, false);
101    }
102
103    private static void inspectProperties(Class<?> clazz,
104                                          Map<String, JpaMember> members,
105                                          boolean hasColumnAnnotation) {
106        try {
107            Stream.of(Introspector.getBeanInfo(clazz).getPropertyDescriptors())
108                    .filter(property -> !members.containsKey(property.getName()))
109                    .filter(property -> !(property instanceof IndexedPropertyDescriptor))
110                    .filter(property -> !"class".equals(property.getName()))
111                    .filter(property -> property.getWriteMethod() != null)
112                    .forEach(property -> {
113                        Method getter = property.getReadMethod();
114                        Method setter = property.getWriteMethod();
115
116                        Column column = Stream.of(getter, setter)
117                                .filter(Objects::nonNull)
118                                .map(method -> method.getAnnotation(Column.class))
119                                .filter(Objects::nonNull)
120                                .findFirst()
121                                .orElse(null);
122                        if ((column != null) == hasColumnAnnotation) {
123                            members.put(property.getName(), new JpaMember(clazz, column, property));
124                        }
125                    });
126        } catch (IntrospectionException e) {
127            LOGGER.warn("Unable to introspect " + clazz, e);
128        }
129    }
130
131    public JpaMember lookupMember(String columnLabel) {
132        String column = columnLabel.toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT);
133        return members.stream()
134                .filter(member -> column.equals(member.getColumnName().toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT)))
135                .findFirst()
136                .orElse(null);
137    }
138
139    public List<JpaMember> members() {
140        return members;
141    }
142}
